text:
A great time place to spend family bonding with a lot of interesting activities and learning about the history of Singapore to the current moment of our times.

Transportation for both Public and Private vehicle is easily and accessible.

Explore with your family and friends!
very peaceful and nice food very good.and more activities like listening the history of singapore and also there is a cinema and playround for toodlers.
Wonderful place to know & to teach to kids about the history of Singapore. Halal certified Restaurant is awesome. A bit pricey but the food was delicious with nice ambiance.

Interesting and exciting tour. All tours are free and the exhibitions were full of interactive activities. Learn a lot about the early times of singapore in the lens of time exhibition !! Highly recommended to visit this place :)))

Visit again this place after one year and still like this place so much

I had an amazing time at the Singapore Discovery Centre! It’s honestly one of the most underrated attractions in Singapore. The exhibits are interactive, engaging, and incredibly informative — perfect for both kids and adults. I especially loved the “Through the Lens of Time” gallery, which beautifully showcases Singapore’s journey from past to present.

The XD theatre and escape room were so much fun and added an unexpected thrill to the visit. Plus, the tour guide Javier was friendly and helpful, making the entire experience smooth and enjoyable.

What stood out most to me was how the centre blends education and entertainment so effortlessly. Whether you’re a tourist wanting to learn more about Singapore or a local rediscovering our roots, this place has something for everyone. Can’t recommend it enough!
